main event: Witnesses observed a bright, circular object in the sky at low altitude over Kilborne, Illinois on March 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as round or disc-shaped, approximately 50 feet in diameter, and made no sound., The sightings typically occurred on clear, moonlit nights between 10 PM and 2 AM., The craft hovered silently for 5-10 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., A neighbor also reported seeing a strange object at the same time, describing it as disc-shaped and bright red-orange., There were multiple witnesses, and the event was observed for about 30 minutes.
witness description: Two neighbors and a husband saw the object along with the main witness.
